import React from 'react' import './ProblemSolvingRiskManagement.scss' // assuming this is your SCSS file name const ProblemSolvingRiskManagement = () => { return (

Problem Solving and Risk Management

My Approach to Problem Solving

I follow a structured approach to cybersecurity challenges that involves quickly identifying issues, thoroughly analyzing root causes, and implementing effective mitigations. I emphasize clear documentation and communication throughout the process to ensure transparency and continuous learning.

Risk Management Frameworks & Techniques

I apply industry-standard frameworks such as the NIST Risk Management Framework (RMF) to evaluate the likelihood and impact of cybersecurity threats. This helps prioritize remediation efforts and focus on high-impact risks. I also leverage quantitative and qualitative risk assessments to guide decision-making.

Tools and Techniques

  • Security Information and Event Management (SIEM) tools like Splunk for log analysis
  • Network traffic analysis with Wireshark to identify anomalous behavior
  • Vulnerability scanning tools to detect and prioritize weaknesses
  • Root cause analysis and timeline reconstruction during incident investigations

Case Study: Phishing Incident Response

During a simulated phishing campaign detection, I utilized Splunk to identify suspicious email patterns, correlated them with user-reported incidents, and isolated affected accounts promptly. I then assisted in remediation by coordinating password resets and user awareness training. Post-incident, I helped update email filtering rules and detection queries to prevent recurrence.

Continuous Improvement

Every incident is a learning opportunity. I document findings, update playbooks, and communicate lessons learned across the team to strengthen our overall security posture.

Soft Skills in Problem Solving

Effective risk management requires collaboration and clear communication. I prioritize working with cross-functional teams and stakeholders to ensure aligned goals and timely resolutions.

) } export default ProblemSolvingRiskManagement
